title: Poster, Exhibition Poster : Richard Long, Städtisches Museum, Mönchengladbach, Germany, 1970
title_raw: Exhibition Poster : Richard Long, Städtisches Museum, Mönchengladbach, Germany
inscribed: Imprinted in brown, bottom edge: "RICHARD LONG STÄDTISCHES MUSEUM MÖNCHENGLADBACH/ BISMARCKSTRASSE 97 16.7. - 30.8.1970 DI. - FR. 10 - 13 UND 15 - 18 UHR. SA. UND SO. 10 - 13 UHR."
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment and Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Art exhibition poster showing a black and white photo of a person standing in the desert with a mountain range in the distance on the horizon.  The text is printed in brown along the bottom.  The sheet is an oblong horizontal to emphasize the panoramic view of the landscape.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, Exhibition Poster : Richard Long, Städtisches Museum, Mönchengladbach, Germany, 1970. Offset lithograph. 
Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment and Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1999-45-18.
